description: This promptware is used to extract contact information from a block of text.
creator: OpenAI

extract_contact_information.name: extract_contact_information
extract_contact_information.description: This promptware is used to extract contact information from a block of text.
extract_contact_information.instruction: Extract the name and mailing address from this email:

input.text:
Dear Kelly,

It was great to talk to you at the seminar. I thought Jane's talk was quite good.

Thank you for the book. Here's my address 2111 Ash Lane, Crestview CA 92002

Best,

Maya

Name:

example.output:
Maya
Mailing Address:
2111 Ash Lane, Crestview CA 92002

example_prompt:
Extract the name and mailing address from this email:



Dear Kelly,

It was great to talk to you at the seminar. I thought Jane's talk was quite good.

Thank you for the book. Here's my address 2111 Ash Lane, Crestview CA 92002

Best,

Maya

Name:
